place_brief_desc: An archaeological site in western Greece, known for its ancient ruins, including the Temple of Zeus and the Olympic Stadium.
place_longer_desc: Olympia was the site of the ancient Olympic Games. Visitors can see the ruins of the Temple of Zeus, the Olympic Stadium, and the Olympia Museum, which houses a collection of artifacts from the site. Olympia is also a great place to go hiking and enjoy the stunning scenery.
